com.facebook.litho

Class SpecGeneratedComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.Component
      • com.facebook.litho.SpecGeneratedComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Equivalence<Component>, EventDispatcher, EventTriggerTarget, HasEventDispatcher, HasEventTrigger, ContentAllocator, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Card, CardClip, CardShadow, EditText, HorizontalScroll, Image, Progress, Recycler, RecyclerCollectionComponent, SizeSpecMountWrapperComponent, SolidColor, Spinner, TestComponent, TestSizeDependentComponent, Text, TextInput, TouchableFeedback, TransparencyEnabledCard, TransparencyEnabledCardClip, VerticalScroll, ViewCompatComponent, ViewPagerComponent, Wrapper

    public abstract class SpecGeneratedComponent
extends Component
implements ContentAllocator, EventTriggerTarget, HasEventTrigger
    Base class for all component generated via the Spec API (@LayoutSpec and @MountSpec).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpecGeneratedComponent.TransitionContainer
      Generated component's state container could implement this interface along with StateContainer when componentspec specifies state update method with OnUpdateStateWithTransition annotation.

      • render

        protected RenderResult render(RenderStateContext renderStateContext,
                              ComponentContext c,
                              int widthSpec,
                              int heightSpec)
        Description copied from class: Component
        Invokes the Component-specific render implementation, returning a RenderResult. The RenderResult will have the Component this Component rendered to (which will then need to be render()'ed or #resolve(LayoutStateContext, ComponentContext)'ed), as well as other metadata from that render call such as transitions that should be applied.
        Overrides:
        render in class Component

      • getExtraAccessibilityNodeAt

        protected int getExtraAccessibilityNodeAt(ComponentContext c,
                                          int x,
                                          int y,
                                          InterStagePropsContainer InterStagePropsContainer)
        Get extra accessibility node id at a given point within the component.
        Parameters:
        x - x co-ordinate within the mounted component
        y - y co-ordinate within the mounted component
        Returns:
        the extra virtual view id if one is found, otherwise ExploreByTouchHelper#INVALID_ID

      • onBoundsDefined

        protected void onBoundsDefined(ComponentContext c,
                               ComponentLayout layout,
                               InterStagePropsContainer interStagePropsContainer)
        Called after the layout calculation is finished and the given ComponentLayout has its bounds defined. You can use ComponentLayout.getX(), ComponentLayout.getY(), ComponentLayout.getWidth(), and ComponentLayout.getHeight() to get the size and position of the component in the layout tree.
        Parameters:
        c - The Context used by this component.
        layout - The ComponentLayout with defined position and size.

      • onDetached

        protected void onDetached(ComponentContext c)
        Called when the component is detached from the ComponentTree.
        Parameters:
        c - The ComponentContext the Component was constructed with.

      • onError

        protected void onError(ComponentContext c,
                       java.lang.Exception e)
        Called to provide a fallback if a supported lifecycle method throws an exception. It is possible to either recover from the error here or reraise the exception to catch it at a higher level or crash the application.
        Parameters:
        c - The ComponentContext the Component was constructed with.
        e - The exception caught.
        See Also:
        OnError

      • createRecyclingPool

        public MountItemsPool.ItemPool createRecyclingPool()
        Description copied from interface: ContentAllocator
        Creates an ItemPool for this mountable content. Returning null will generate a default pool.
        Specified by:
        createRecyclingPool in interface ContentAllocator

      • canPreallocate

        public boolean canPreallocate()
        Description copied from interface: ContentAllocator
        This API informs the framework to fill the content pool for this Mountable ahead of time. The default value is false, i.e. content is not pre-allocated. Pre-allocation of the content can improve performance in some circumstances where creating the content is expensive.
        Specified by:
        canPreallocate in interface ContentAllocator
        Returns:
        true if this component can be preallocated.

      • onCreateMountContentPool

        public MountContentPool onCreateMountContentPool()
        Description copied from interface: ContentAllocator
        Creates the content pool the framework should use for this Mountable.

        Experimental. Currently for Litho team internal use only.

        Specified by:
        onCreateMountContentPool in interface ContentAllocator
        Returns:
        the MountContentPool that should be used to recycle mount content for this mount spec.

      • poolSize

        public int poolSize()
        Description copied from interface: ContentAllocator
        This API informs the framework about the size of the content pool. The default is 3.

        Experimental. Currently for Litho team internal use only.

        Specified by:
        poolSize in interface ContentAllocator
